name: Claude AI Copilot
description: Claude AI powered vault assistant that can edit, create, and delete notes across your entire vault using natural language. The focus of this plugin is fast and easy editing of 1 or more notes via quick one-off prompt submissions, not chatting with your notes. There is no chat interface, just a modal to submit prompts. This makes for really simple but powerful edits. Ex: "Find all the tasks I didn't complete in the last 3 daily notes and copy them to today's daily note". Web search tools are enabled for Claude, so it can also find information from the open internet to include in notes.
author: Eric Anderson
